about_the_game:
Apocalypse Delivery Service is an exciting survival and adventure game.
You will enter a post-apocalyptic world where you play as a courier delivering packages.
But don't think it will be easy! Your task is to find necessary items, survive, and most importantly, escape from the city.

Here's what awaits you:

3D world: The game is presented in three-dimensional graphics, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the post-apocalyptic world.
Item search: You will need to carefully explore the environment to find necessary items. It could be a door key, medicine, or other resources that will help you survive.

So get ready for an exciting adventure where every step could cost you your life

name: Apocalypse Delivery Service

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
